But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%>, after that ye have known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5631><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, or <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> are known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5685><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> turn ye <S%G1994><s%> <S%G5719><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the weak <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beggarly <S%G4434><s%> elements <S%G4747><s%>, whereunto <S%G3739><s%> ye desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> <S%G509><s%> to be in bondage <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5721><s%>?

<S%G1161><s%> Ye know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> I preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5668><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> at the first <S%G4386><s%>.

They zealously affect <S%G2206><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, but not <S%G3756><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>; yea <S%G235><s%>, they would <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> exclude <S%G1576><s%> <S%G5658><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye might affect <S%G2206><s%> <S%G5725><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this Agar <S%G28><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Arabia <S%G688><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> answereth <S%G4960><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> now is <S%G3568><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> is in bondage <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5719><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%> which is above <S%G507><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> free <S%G1658><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.
